alert.note: Alert for Butte; Lawrence; Meade (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 4:42PM MDT until May 27 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Butte County in northwestern South Dakota... Southwestern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Central Lawrence County in west central South Dakota... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 442 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles south of Nisland to near Whitewood to 2 miles south of Cheyenne Crossing, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Whitewood and Apple Springs around 445 PM MDT. Sturgis and Deadwood around 450 PM MDT. Vale and Fort Meade around 455 PM MDT. Galena and Bear Butte State Park around 500 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Tilford, Dalton Lake, Piedmont and Summerset. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 22 and 48. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
